title: Notice to other states
context: ยง291E-42 Notice to other states. When a nonresident&rsquo;s driving and boating privileges, and motor vehicle registration if applicable, are administratively revoked under this part, the director shall: (1) Notify, in writing, the officials in charge of traffic control, boating control, or public safety in the nonresident&rsquo;s home state, and in any other state in which the nonresident has driving and boating privileges, licenses, or any motor vehicles registered if applicable, of the action taken in this State; and (2) Return to the appropriate issuing authority in the other states any license, and any motor vehicle registration and number plates if applicable, seized under section 291E-33. [L 2000, c 189, pt of ยง23; am L 2001, c 157, ยง22]
